name: Time Keeper (itch)
description:
A top-down shooter style game except you have a spear instead of a projectile based weapon. You are the Time Keeper of a world infected by the corruption and you must turn back time to before the infestation.

CONTROLS:

[WASD] - Movement

[Left-Click] - Attack

This is a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, The theme of the jam was REWIND.

This is my first submission to a game jam so let me know if you have any suggestions for improvement. Any feedback is appreciated.
